description: The 31st Joint Fighter Squadron Africa, also known as the Storm Witches is a squadron with an even longer service history than the 501st. It combined Jagdgeschwader 27 from the Karlsl√§nder Afrikakoprs with volunteer witches from Fuso, who were dispatched to Africa in 1941 to hold the the Neuroi threat at bay.
name: Dai 31 Tougou Sentou Hikoutai Africa
